name: Time Cube
description:
This game is still on development, but please feel free to leave us your feedback.
개발 중인 게임입니다. 피드백은 감사히 받습니다.

Currently, the game lacks in:
- Sprites
- Overall difficulty curve
- In-game storytelling (include ending)

Thank you for playing!

◆ Control
※ Please move to the right corner to proceed to the next  stage. There are 3 stages.

- Move: Arrow keys
- Slow mode: (hold) Shift
- Attack: C (toggle)
- Spell (Bomb): X
- Time control: Z
- Pause: ESC or P

◆ Language
- English

◆ Known Issues
- Some hit sound are bigger than the others.
- Phase 2, 4 of Boss 1 becomes too simple after the zakoes are defeated.
- The pink bullets on Stage 2 can be mistaken for items.
- Missing bullet-approach-warning for phase 4 of Boss 3.
- In settings menu, the resolution drop-down displays wrong item.

◆ CREDITS

Referred to Reisen (from Touhou IN) for the blue bullets of Boss 3.
